amendment.description: To lower the FY13 discretionary budget authority cap as set in the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 by $11,000,000,000 in order to offset the general fund transfers to the Highway Trust Fund.

action.text: Amendment SA 1785 proposed by Senator Corker.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1785.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary provisions with respect to amendment SA 1785 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 58. Record Vote Number: 44.
Amendment SA 1785 ruled out of order by the chair.
